item.title: Squeezing the Best Performance Out of YOLOX with Weights and Biases
item.description: ðŸ”Ž Motivation tip By the end of this post you will learn how to: Install the Weights and Biases client and log the YOLOX training metrics. Compare training metrics on Weights and Biases dashboard. Picking the best model with mAP and FPS values. “So many models, so little time!” As a machine learning engineer, I often hear this phrase thrown around in many variations. In object detection alone, there are already several hundreds of models out there.
